STATE
v.
Christopher Lee KING. No. 229P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 24, 2015. Mr. M. Gordon Widenhouse, Jr., Chapel Hill, for King, Christopher Lee. June S. Ferrell, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Gary W. Frank, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th of July 2015 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:
